msbt.message: You know the fireworks show is at 7 tonight, yeah? Stretch out your neck muscles for optimal viewing!
I'm so pumped—and not because I just worked out. The fireworks show is at 7 tonight!I mean, I did just work out, in case you were curious, .

Are you ready to rock tonight? And by rock, I mean passively stare at the sky? It's the fireworks show!It's at 7 tonight, but it's never too early to pick out a good spot and start doing burpees. Let's GO!
Are you ready? Are you pumped? Got your glasses? Your visor? Your hat? Whatever you need? Sorry It's just that the fireworks show is about to start, and I'm full of nervous energy, !
Hey, the fireworks show is about to start! No more blinking—flex and hold those eyelids, !
The fireworks show is allllmost here. I love the way the sky lights up all my favorite muscle groups
Well, that's it for the fireworks show, I guess I was just hoping for one more rep at the end, you know?
Sorry if I looked like I was spacing out during the fireworks show.I was just so in awe that my jaw dropped harder than a 45-pound dumbbell, !
It gets really dark when the fireworks show is over, huh? It's not just that my eye-ceps are weak, right?
Well, that's the last fireworks show of the season. I can't wait for the next season, !
, I don't think I blinked once during a single fireworks show this year.I trained by watching the clothes tumble in my washing machine for HOURS
Maybe it's just because it was the last fireworks show of the yearbut it felt more special than usual.
